desc: Print all matching executables in PATH, not just the first
Read aliases from stdin, reporting matching ones on stdout
Read shell function definitions from stdin, reporting matching ones on stdout
Skip dirs in PATH that start with a dot
Skip dirs in PATH that start with tilde and executables in \$HOME

Output a tilde when a dir matches the \$HOME
Stop processing options on the right if not on tty
